title: i'm in a low priority queue and i don't know why
body:
earlier today i played with a friend of mine, and after the game he got banned for 14 days for being toxic. i didn't talk or do anything the entire game, but a few hours later i started a game and my queue time was red. i checked what it means and i found out that i'm in a low priority queue. i have no idea why since i didn't receive any notice about being punished for anything. i have a picture of it but i don't know how to post it so i linked it here.

if anyone could help me understand that would be great!

replies.body: I'm not currently seeing any kind of bans or low priority queues on your account, but I wonder if you were still queued up with the person who got a penalty earlier on? If you're in a queue with someone who has a low priority queue, you will need to wait through that queue with them.
